main event: A sighting of a brilliant light moving at high speed in the sky was reported in La Paz, Bolivia on August 6, 1962.
interesting points: The object was round in shape and traveled from east to west at an extremely high rate of speed., The sighting lasted approximately 5-10 seconds., The object disappeared behind cloud cover without making any sound., Illumination of the surroundings was noted during the sighting., The witness observed it in an unobstructed view of the horizon.
sighted object: a brilliant light in the sky
